mapper.select: select id, unit_name, device_id, device_name, dept_id, dept_name, user_id, user_name, longitude, latitude, radius, state, create_time, update_time from prevention_unit where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into prevention_unit(unit_name, device_id, device_name, dept_id, dept_name, user_id, user_name, longitude, latitude, radius, state, create_time, update_time) values (#{unitName}, #{deviceId}, #{deviceName}, #{deptId}, #{deptName}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{radius}, #{state}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into prevention_unit(unit_name, device_id, device_name, dept_id, dept_name, user_id, user_name, longitude, latitude, radius, state, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.unitName}, #{entity.deviceId}, #{entity.deviceName}, #{entity.deptId}, #{entity.deptName}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.longitude}, #{entity.latitude}, #{entity.radius}, #{entity.state}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into prevention_unit(unit_name, device_id, device_name, dept_id, dept_name, user_id, user_name, longitude, latitude, radius, state, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.unitName}, #{entity.deviceId}, #{entity.deviceName}, #{entity.deptId}, #{entity.deptName}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.longitude}, #{entity.latitude}, #{entity.radius}, #{entity.state}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update unit_name = values(unit_name), device_id = values(device_id), device_name = values(device_name), dept_id = values(dept_id), dept_name = values(dept_name), user_id = values(user_id), user_name = values(user_name), longitude = values(longitude), latitude = values(latitude), radius = values(radius), state = values(state), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update prevention_unit
unit_name = #{unitName},
device_id = #{deviceId},
device_name = #{deviceName},
dept_id = #{deptId},
dept_name = #{deptName},
user_id = #{userId},
user_name = #{userName},
longitude = #{longitude},
latitude = #{latitude},
radius = #{radius},
state = #{state},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
